job.title: Network Engineer
job.description: DescriptionbrpSEMCON provides a highly qualified professional and responsive technical and managerial workforce to satisfy customer requirements that support the Federal Aviation Administration FAAaposs mission vision goals  SEMCONs company culture aligns enriching career experiences growth opportunities and collaborative engagement for all employees resulting in a company value being greater than the sum of our partsbrbrppbrbrbrppWe are currently searching for a Network Engineer to join our teambrbrppbrbrbrppThe Network Engineer should have advanced knowledge in the following areas brbrpulliCisco ASA routers and switchesliliNetworking in a virtual environment and with Dynamic Virtual SwitchesliliConfiguring proxy servers and firewalls in secure enterprise networks liulpThe Network Engineer will provide remote support of branch offices ASA routers and monitoring of network equipment and remote upgrades and will support a tier3 helpdesk including afterhours support as needed Experience with Akamai Content Delivery Network and Cloud Architecture is  desiredbrbrppbrbrbrppStrong written and verbal communication skills are required as well as the ability to collect and analyze data and communicate technical information Experience in using basic software packages such as MS Office suite is desiredbrbrppbrbrbrppA Bacheloraposs degree in Engineering math or science and at least 15 years of related work experience is required brbrpp  brbrppSEMCON offers a competitive salary and complete benefits package which includes health benefits medical dental vision and life 401K with a generous employer match paid time off and paid holidaysbrbrpbrbrRequirements
